markdownRemark.html:
This is the method I used to create this blog in just a few hours

To get started

disclaimer: not everything is completely free.

Things that are not free:

  • Domain name (around $5 - $10)

Things that are free:

  • Cloudflare CDN
  • Google Cloud Build (120 minutes per day)
  • Google Cloud Storage (5gb free per month)
  • github.com public repository
  • Google Analytics
  • Gatsby static site generator

frontmatter.title: Hosting a blog on Google Cloud for free (mostly)
